system.sustained:
Fires a cone in front of the Weirdboy like a weapon with Spray Quality that ignores cover and solid objects such as walls (but not Armour Points or Toughness). Each target makes +0 Agility test to evade or -10 Toughness Test to endure or suffer 2d5+Psy Rating Rending Damage with Unstable Quality. Inanimate objects are unaffected, and creatures with Daemonic or Machine trait take half damage (round up).
Spray: Fires in a 30 degree arc, All targets in range make +0 Agility Test or are hit, Hit location is always body.
Unstable: On hit, roll 1d10, on a 1 deal half damage, on 2-9 deal normal damage, on a 10 deal double damage
